repairedDockerfile:
FROM jetbrains/teamcity-minimal-agent:latest

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive
ENV DEBCONF_NONINTERACTIVE_SEEN true

# Install Python stuff
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    build-essential \
    checkinstall \
    libreadline-gplv2-dev \
    libncursesw5-dev \
    libssl-dev \
    libsqlite3-dev \
    tk-dev \
    libgdbm-dev \
    libc6-dev \
    libbz2-dev \
    wget \
    locales && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Set the locale
RUN locale-gen en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANGUAGE en_US:en
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8

# Install 3.6.6
RUN cd /usr/src && wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.6/Python-3.6.6.tgz && tar xzf Python-3.6.6.tgz && rm Python-3.6.6.tgz
RUN cd /usr/src/Python-3.6.6 && ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" && make altinstall

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    git \

    python3-pip \
    software-properties-common \

    libpq-dev \

    libjpeg-dev \
    zlib1g-dev \
    libpng-dev \

    docker.io \

    awscli && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# docker compose
RUN curl -f -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.23.1/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
RUN chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose

# node 11 and yarn 1.15
RUN curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_11.x -o nodesource_setup.sh
RUN bash nodesource_setup.sh
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nodejs && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN node -v

RUN curl -f -sL https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add -
RUN echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list
RUN apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends yarn && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN yarn -v
